history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08292
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING THE POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES AS THE NATIONAL POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY, STRENGTHENING IT FOR THE PURPOSE, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to strengthen and elevate PUP as an institution empowered and committed in producing country’s future industry leaders and professionals towards nation-building and national development. Intends to raise the level of other polytechnic SUCs and serve National PUP as their guide in developing professional and technical course offerings that are responsive to local and international demand.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : JAVIER, PAOLO EVERARDO S.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Ortega (P.) (000 2018-10-02)2. Arcillas (000 2018-10-03)
